{"id":422896100,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1606032404,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/422896100/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"6.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        bool sign;\n        long lon= x;\n        long int pro=1;\n        long int l=0;\n        vector<int> num;\n        if(lon>0) {\n            sign=0;\n        }\n        else {\n            sign=1;\n            lon*=-1;\n        }\n        \n        for(int i=0;lon!=0;i++){\n            num.push_back(lon%10);\n            lon/=10;\n        }\n        for(int i=num.size()-1;i>=0;i--){\n            l+=pro*num[i];\n            pro*=10;\n        }\n        if(l>2147483647) return 0;\n        else if(l<-2147483647) return 0;\n        if(!sign) return l;\n        else return -l;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer"}
